headline: Overweight Call on Vistra (VST) From KeyBanc Highlights Scale and Cash Flow Strength
summary: Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) is included among the 14 Best US Stocks to Buy for Long Term. On November 25, KeyBanc initiated its coverage on Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) with an Overweight rating and a $217 price target. The firm appreciated the company’s scale, “diversified” generation mix, and “strong” cash flow. According to the analyst, these aspects […]
